Language?
Any other languages than english included?
Language is English. If you want me to make and upload a version of this torrent with specific languages added, just post and i'll put one together as soon as i can and upload it.

Or you can follow my instructions below to activate one of the 35 languages in Ultimate:

To change language for just your account:

Once you have downloaded and installed Windows 7 Ultimate, go to Windows Update (type "wup" in Start menu).
Check for updates and show the optional updates.
Download and install any language that you would like.
Once the language pack you want is installed, type "change display language" in Start menu and press ENTER.
Select your language and click OK!

To change language for all users continue with the steps below:

Type "change display language" in Start menu and press ENTER.
Select the "Administrative" tab, and click the "Copy settings..." button.
Select and tick the 2 checkboxes and click OK!

You now have your desired language ;-)

Also, @2010Kaiser, does the 64 bit part work with a current 32 bit OS? I have 32 bit installed legally with my legally bought CD, but my activations ran out so my current OS was installed with a legal CD, but I used WAT remover for the genuine stuff, and my computer can run 64 bit, but I dont have a 64 bit CD, so would the 64 bit succesfully upgrade my OS?

Boredguy121

1) Burn the image to a dual layer DVD or put it onto a bootable USB drive.
2) Then go into your BIOS and select "Boot from USB drive".
3) Re-boot and install will begin.
4) Select which version and architecture you want to install when you get the O/S options window.
5) When you get the 10 second countdown bar, take the USB out as close to 0 seconds as you can or the install will begin all over again.
That's it.
6) The loader incorporated in the upload does the activation for you.

fsxking08

You'll have to check if your processor supports a 64bit O/S and make sure you have 3 - 4GB or more of RAM for it to run smoothly.

How can you install a new operating system off a virtual drive which is a piece of software on your current operating system.
Burn the image to a dual layer DVD at slow speed and create a bootable disk.
Or transfer it to a flash drive of 5GB or more and boot off that.
